TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle Implements ICloneable
public ref class DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle sealed : ICloneable

Docs.summary: Contains border styles for the cells in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項可讓您完全自訂其外觀，包括標頭與資料格的框線。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>已經<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>可讓您設定儲存格框線的外觀屬性。 不過，如果您需要進一步自訂框線，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>類別可讓您設定個別的側邊的資料格的框線樣式。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>分別代表左、 右、 上框線和下框線的資料格。 您可以設定這些屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>產生各種不同的儲存格之間的框線的外觀。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整的儲存格框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>以便框線為雙線分隔內部的資料格以及頂端的左邊標頭資料格資料列和資料行的標頭。 這個範例會示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>，並<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A>方法，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A>屬性。 這些成員使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle>物件，以修改個別資料格框線。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle/CS/advancedborderstyle.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle/VB/advancedborderstyle.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>屬性未設定為相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>。
